infos.value: We did it...
Oh, my. You really did.
Huh?
Mariale...
You cannot talk your way out of this one.
How ironic, for someone to claim to want to end the fighting...
And yet bring about all of this death as a result.
Just how many of your fellow shinobi must fall before you're satisfied?
You're wrong. I...
Is there something I'm missing!?
You just want to be with that man, don't you?
And you don't care how many of your own people need to be sacrificed because of it.
You do all this, yet claim to want Gouga and Saiga to be one?
You disgust me! You're nothing but a traitor!
H-hold on. We—
—Now, Zazan!
What...!?
Ah...
So this is love, huh. Too bad for you...
I won't miss next time. Ha ha ha ha ha!
Zazan the Unkillable... A master at playing dead. Hahaha!
Loreila...
Don't you worry. You'll see her soon enough.
...ive...able.
...What's that? Speak up!
Unforgiveable.
Absolutely...unforgiveable!
You still don't understand the position you're in, do you?
...You're surrounded.
Do you get it now? This is the end of Saiga.
I will send you to your grave.
Kill him. He's lived long enough...
...What!?
What just happened!?
You're next!
You were on the brink of death! Where did you get all this power from!?
...Lord Skahal, there you are!
...What!?
Damn! And now the Saiga shinobi are here, too!?
Zazan, let us withdraw.
D-damn you, Gouga!
Our two villages will never be one.
I will crush them...
I will destroy Gouga and erase it from this world!
Gouga and Saiga, their leaders in love, were meant to be united into a single country.
However—fate was not on their side.
His lover Loreila slain, Skahal abandoned his dreams of a peaceful union with Gouga.
The people of Gouga supported Mariale as their new chief. She devoted herself to the destruction of Saiga.
Thus, the two villages began their fierce and bloody battle...
